question: When I get angry, I can't talk. Is that normal? ?
question_content: I get easily annoyed at everyone and thing at random times. Everytime I get angry, I can't talk. I will try my hardest to express myself but it just won't come out. If I get anything to come out I would start crying. Is this behavior normal?

answers.answer_content:
It's normal. I do it all the time. 
You get frustrated, that's all it is ~ ^^
Very normal. That happens to me all the time.
maybe your having small panic attacks, you need to speak to your doctor about it, dont worry though your not on your own, a lot of people are like this, so it will be ok.
You internalise your anger. It's fairly common/normal, though probably not that healthy.
I do this and I have anxiety issues. It's called selective mutism.
